Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored the equalizer in the 90+5th minute of stoppage time to earn England a 2-2 draw against Belgium.
Pre-Game Insights: Kobbie Mainoo made his first start for England and performed well.
Ivan Toney scored his first goal for England from the penalty spot.
Gareth Southgate made five changes from the side that lost to Brazil, including Kobbie Mainoo and Ivan Toney starting for England.
Post-Match Reflections: England secured a 2-2 draw against Belgium, thanks to Jude Bellingham's last-minute equalizer.
Rob Page's Wales team lost on penalties to Poland in the Euro 2024 play-off.
Daniel James missed a crucial penalty for Wales in the shootout.
Robert Lewandowski scored a penalty to help Poland qualify for Euro 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a tightly contested affair with both teams creating chances.
Kobbie Mainoo was impressive in his first start for England.
The match ended in extra time before going to penalties for Wales vs Poland.
Lewis Dunk was criticized for his performance by Ian Ladyman for making errors at the back.
Others: England had a poor defensive record, according to SOFASCORE stats.
Wales dominated the first half but missed a penalty due to offside.
Poland qualified for Euro 2024 after winning the penalty shootout against Wales.
